description: The Lexar Echo ZE: Your Simple, Automatic, Portable Backup Solution Whether you're a business professional on the road, a student doing homework at a friend's house, or someone simply using a laptop in a cafe, it's important to ensure the files on your netbook or notebook are protected. Lexar Echo portable backup drives provide a convenient way to automatically back up your files on the go.Thanks to Lexar Echo ZE's backup software functionality and its extremely easy-to-use interface, saving and protecting valuable data such as documents, presentations, photos, audio, and video files is no longer a tedious task. Restoring data is just a click away.
title: Lexar Echo ZE 8GB  USB Backup Flash Drive LEHZE8GBASBNA
